PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2004-09002004-08-09,  FAIT,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActAppropriation Act No. 2, 2003-2004
PrecisAppointment of DAVID ANGELL as High Commissioner for Canada in the Federal Republic of Nigeria; STEFANIE BECK as Ambassador of Canada to the Republic of Croatia; ANNA BIOLIK as Ambassador of Canada to the Republic og Kazakhstan, with concurrent accreditation to the Kyrgyz Republic and to the Republic of Tajikistan; DONALD BOBIASH as High Commissioner for Canada in the Republic of Ghana; JEAN-PIERRE BOLDUC as Ambassador of Canada to the Democratic Republic of Congo; CLUADE BOUCHER as Ambassador of Canada to the Republic of Haiti; GERRY CAMPBELL as Consul General of Canada at Hong King Special Administrative Region (People's Republic of China), with concurrent accreditation as Consul General to Macao Special Administrative Region (Pewople's Republic of China); DENIS COMEAU as Ambassador of Canada to the Kingdom of Thailand, with concurrent accreditation to the Union of Myanmar; GENEVIÈVE des RIVIÈRES as Ambassador of Canada to the Republic of Peru, with concurrent accreditation to the Republic of Bolivia; JOHN DEYELL as High Commissioner for Canada in the Republic of Zambia, with concurrent accreditation to the Republic of Malawi; PATRICIA FULLER as Ambassador of Canada to the Eastern Republic of Uruguay; YVES GAGNON as Ambassador of Canada to the Argentine Republic, with concurrent accreditation to the Republic of Paraguay; MARIUS GRINIUS as Ambassador of Canada to the Republic of Korea; ROBERT HAGE as Ambassador of Canada to the Republic of Hungar, with concurrent accreditation to the Republic of Slovenia; GWYNETH A. KUTZ as Ambassador of Canada to the Republic of El Salvador; MARC LORTIE as Ambassador of Canada to the Kingdom of Spain, with concurrent accreditation to the Principality of Andorra; ANDREW McALISTER as High Commissioner for Canada in the United Republic of Tanzania, with concurrent accreditation to the Republic of Seychelles, and as Ambassador of Canada to the Federal Islamic Republic of the Comoros; JOHN McNEE as Ambassador of Canada to the Kindgom of Belgium; ROBERT PECK as Ambassador of Canada to the People's Democratic Republic of Algeria; BRUNO PICARD as High Commissioner for Canada in the Co-operative Republic of Guyana, with concurrent accreditation as Ambassador of Canada to the Republic of Suriname; DONICA POTTIE as Ambassador of Canada to the Kingdom of Cambodia; DAVID SPROULE as High Commissioner for Canada in the People's Republic of Bangladesh; CARMEN SYLVAIN as Ambassador of Canada to the Kingdom of Morocco; DENIS THIBAULT as Ambassador of Canada to the State of Kuwait, with concurrent accreditation to the State of Qatar; DAVID VIVEASH as Ambassador of Canada to the Great Socialist People's Libyan Arab Jamahiriya; and MICHAEL WELSH as High Commissioner for Canada in Barbados, with concurrent accreditation to Grenada, Antigua and Barbuda, Saint Lucia and to the Federation of Saint Christopher and Nevis, and as Commissioner for Canada to the British Dependent Territories of Montserrat, Anguilla, and the British Virgin Islands.
